title: A2A Part
description: Part union type for message content (A2A Specification Section 4.1.6). ADCP declares only the structure of parts[].data (DataPart data field) for task-specific payloads.
notes: This schema is a 1:1 copy of A2A Protocol's Part union type. ADCP declares only the structure of parts[].data (DataPart data field) for task-specific payloads.

data.description: DataPart: Structured data content. ADCP declares only the structure of this data field for task-specific payloads.

file.description: FilePart: File reference with mediaType, name, and fileWithBytes or uri.
